channel.title: ScoreBoard Gone Wrong?
channel.description:
[code]server.java:26: ranks is already defined in server public static int[] ranks = new int[11]; ^ server.java:46: cannot find symbol symbol : variable updateServer location: class server if(updateServer) ^ server.java:138: cannot find symbol symbol : variable updateSeconds location: class server updateSeconds = 180 - ((int)(curTime - startTime) / 1000); ^ server.java:138: cannot find symbol symbol : variable startTime location: class server updateSeconds = 180 - ((int)(curTime - startTime) / 1000); ^ server.java:139: cannot find symbol symbol : variable updateSeconds location: class server if(updateSeconds == 0) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I get those errors when I compile.
I used this threads [TuT]: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,244887.0.html

item.title: ScoreBoard Gone Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“bryan cole1, post:2, topic:198441”]the first error mean that rank[i] was already in server.java so delete it.
the second error mean the updateServer is not the right void that is in ur source so get the real it should be easily if u download a byte searcher.
the 3rd the same error but in other classes
the 4th another invalid public void declaration. it is another in the source
the last the thingy about updateServer.
my suggetions is get another source.
GL and hope i helped[/quote]
That’s actually a horrible solution. And this was posted months ago.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bryan_cole1 wrote:

the first error mean that rank[i] was already in server.java so delete it.
the second error mean the updateServer is not the right void that is in ur source so get the real it should be easily if u download a byte searcher.
the 3rd the same error but in other classes
the 4th another invalid public void declaration. it is another in the source
the last the thingy about updateServer.
my suggetions is get another source.
GL and hope i helped
